message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet in the middle at $1,050,000? This reflects the product's worth while still acknowledging your budget concerns.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'd be willing to go up to $950,000. Can we meet somewhere in between?
